TopicTitle: Something that you would put on a ship...

Articles.Content: Usually, when one downloads a mod such as WW2 warships, Big Ships, or even "it's the little things", he searches for a bit more living space to cram between those boards and panels. However, when one searches for such a mod on google, he gets various habitats, pods, etc that would be more fit for a moon mission than for a sea voyage. Is there any mod around here that would add living space, in a form that can be put into a ship. A boat pack in 0.90, for example, had crew bunks. Maybe there's something else around here.

10 hours ago, Matuchkin said:

snip

Hi, that's not a bad idea, although i not sure how it would be best implemented, you can of course just add crew capacity to almost anything, but i get that's not quite what you want. So something like a crew quarters module that could stand alone or be just at home built into the superstructure of a hull, and knowing mod requests like I do we'll take IVA for granted. I was looking for something else to add to the LBP and this may be the thing. I've made them for spacecraft so why not ships.
